DbCommand.CommandText: DELETE FROM [dbo].[PlayerJewelry] WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_playerStateid = 1 AND [playerStateid] IS NULL) OR ([playerStateid] = @Original_playerStateid)) AND ((@IsNull_jewelryid = 1 AND [jewelryid] IS NULL) OR ([jewelryid] = @Original_jewelryid)) AND ((@IsNull_wearerid = 1 AND [wearerid] IS NULL) OR ([wearerid] = @Original_wearerid)) AND ((@IsNull_slot = 1 AND [slot] IS NULL) OR ([slot] = @Original_slot)))

INSERT INTO [dbo].[PlayerJewelry] ([playerStateid], [jewelryid], [wearerid], [slot]) VALUES (@playerStateid, @jewelryid, @wearerid, @slot); SELECT id, playerStateid, jewelryid, wearerid, slot FROM PlayerJewelry WHERE (id = SCOPE_IDENTITY())
SELECT id, playerStateid, jewelryid, wearerid, slot FROM dbo.PlayerJewelry

UPDATE [dbo].[PlayerJewelry] SET [playerStateid] = @playerStateid, [jewelryid] = @jewelryid, [wearerid] = @wearerid, [slot] = @slot WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_playerStateid = 1 AND [playerStateid] IS NULL) OR ([playerStateid] = @Original_playerStateid)) AND ((@IsNull_jewelryid = 1 AND [jewelryid] IS NULL) OR ([jewelryid] = @Original_jewelryid)) AND ((@IsNull_wearerid = 1 AND [wearerid] IS NULL) OR ([wearerid] = @Original_wearerid)) AND ((@IsNull_slot = 1 AND [slot] IS NULL) OR ([slot] = @Original_slot))); SELECT id, playerStateid, jewelryid, wearerid, slot FROM PlayerJewelry WHERE (id = @id)
SELECT id, jewelryid, playerStateid, slot, wearerid FROM PlayerJewelry WHERE (playerStateid = @playerStateid)

DELETE FROM [dbo].[PlayerParties] WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_playerid = 1 AND [playerid] IS NULL) OR ([playerid] = @Original_playerid)) AND ((@IsNull_slot1id = 1 AND [slot1id] IS NULL) OR ([slot1id] = @Original_slot1id)) AND ((@IsNull_slot2id = 1 AND [slot2id] IS NULL) OR ([slot2id] = @Original_slot2id)) AND ((@IsNull_slot3id = 1 AND [slot3id] IS NULL) OR ([slot3id] = @Original_slot3id)) AND ((@IsNull_slot4id = 1 AND [slot4id] IS NULL) OR ([slot4id] = @Original_slot4id)))

INSERT INTO [dbo].[PlayerParties] ([playerid], [slot1id], [slot2id], [slot3id], [slot4id], [name]) VALUES (@playerid, @slot1id, @slot2id, @slot3id, @slot4id, @name); SELECT id, playerid, slot1id, slot2id, slot3id, slot4id, name FROM PlayerParties WHERE (id = SCOPE_IDENTITY())
SELECT id, playerid, slot1id, slot2id, slot3id, slot4id, name FROM dbo.PlayerParties

UPDATE [dbo].[PlayerParties] SET [playerid] = @playerid, [slot1id] = @slot1id, [slot2id] = @slot2id, [slot3id] = @slot3id, [slot4id] = @slot4id, [name] = @name WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_playerid = 1 AND [playerid] IS NULL) OR ([playerid] = @Original_playerid)) AND ((@IsNull_slot1id = 1 AND [slot1id] IS NULL) OR ([slot1id] = @Original_slot1id)) AND ((@IsNull_slot2id = 1 AND [slot2id] IS NULL) OR ([slot2id] = @Original_slot2id)) AND ((@IsNull_slot3id = 1 AND [slot3id] IS NULL) OR ([slot3id] = @Original_slot3id)) AND ((@IsNull_slot4id = 1 AND [slot4id] IS NULL) OR ([slot4id] = @Original_slot4id))); SELECT id, playerid, slot1id, slot2id, slot3id, slot4id, name FROM PlayerParties WHERE (id = @id)
SELECT TOP (1) id, name, playerid, slot1id, slot2id, slot3id, slot4id FROM PlayerParties WHERE (playerid = @playerid) ORDER BY id DESC

DELETE FROM [dbo].[Players] WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_level = 1 AND [level] IS NULL) OR ([level] = @Original_level)) AND ((@IsNull_experience = 1 AND [experience] IS NULL) OR ([experience] = @Original_experience)) AND ((@IsNull_gold = 1 AND [gold] IS NULL) OR ([gold] = @Original_gold)))
INSERT INTO [dbo].[Players] ([name], [level], [experience], [gold]) VALUES (@name, @level, @experience, @gold); SELECT id, name, level, experience, gold FROM Players WHERE (id = SCOPE_IDENTITY())
SELECT id, name, [level], experience, gold FROM dbo.Players

UPDATE [dbo].[Players] SET [name] = @name, [level] = @level, [experience] = @experience, [gold] = @gold WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_level = 1 AND [level] IS NULL) OR ([level] = @Original_level)) AND ((@IsNull_experience = 1 AND [experience] IS NULL) OR ([experience] = @Original_experience)) AND ((@IsNull_gold = 1 AND [gold] IS NULL) OR ([gold] = @Original_gold))); SELECT id, name, level, experience, gold FROM Players WHERE (id = @id)
SELECT experience, gold, id, level, name FROM Players WHERE (id = @playerid)

DELETE FROM [dbo].[PlayerSkills] WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_playerStateid = 1 AND [playerStateid] IS NULL) OR ([playerStateid] = @Original_playerStateid)) AND ((@IsNull_skillid = 1 AND [skillid] IS NULL) OR ([skillid] = @Original_skillid)))
INSERT INTO [dbo].[PlayerSkills] ([playerStateid], [skillid]) VALUES (@playerStateid, @skillid); SELECT id, playerStateid, skillid FROM PlayerSkills WHERE (id = SCOPE_IDENTITY())
SELECT id, playerStateid, skillid FROM dbo.PlayerSkills

UPDATE [dbo].[PlayerSkills] SET [playerStateid] = @playerStateid, [skillid] = @skillid WHERE (([id] = @Original_id) AND ((@IsNull_playerStateid = 1 AND [playerStateid] IS NULL) OR ([playerStateid] = @Original_playerStateid)) AND ((@IsNull_skillid = 1 AND [skillid] IS NULL) OR ([skillid] = @Original_skillid))); SELECT id, playerStateid, skillid FROM PlayerSkills WHERE (id = @id)
SELECT id, playerStateid, skillid FROM PlayerSkills WHERE (playerStateid = @playerStateid)
